name: Bigertech 筆戈科技 VIS | Logo and Mockups Golden Ratio Gride
description:
This is a science and technology sub-brand from MEIZU. I used a sharp-angle- triangle in designing the G-letter to highlight its ‘Ambitious and Justice’ character. The official website also uses a lot of de-line design language to highlight its cleanliness.


Let's press "Like❤️" button. I will enlarge or update my design file anytime and you will see and duplicate it. No bad, right?


當年魅族科技旗下的「筆戈科技」品牌，Slogan 是「簡單，有趣，有價值」。我選擇了比較尖銳的三角形類設計字母「G」，另外整體設計是基於「黃金分割」比例設計的，即便過去了將近 10 年也依然耐看。


按下“❤️”，我會隨時更新這個設計文件，也方便你隨時查看和複製，大家共同進步。


My Figma Community Page: figma.com/@bearbearwong

My Behance Page: behance.net/bearbearwong

My Website: bearbearwong.github.io
